comment._content: Nice light, cool limos.  I've never seen an old one like those before.

comment.author: 11865422@N08
comment._content: this must be the predecessor to richmond international? it looks gorgeous no matter what.

comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: As far as I know, the terminal shown here is incorporated into the present terminal, though you can't really tell it today.

comment.author: 44136491@N02
comment._content: That was back in the day when you could go out to the airport and stand at the fence and watch the planes land and take off.  I remember taking our sons out there in the late 60's and early 70's.

comment.author: 38254353@N05
comment._content: what an awesome looking building!  Why can't airport buildings look this simple and clean these days?
